title: Tweegi, the fashionable font!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo-main_5230.jpg)

Hello guys, here I'm asking for your help to make my font project  
Tweegi a reality. Tweegi is a super condensed fonts with two  
variables regular and italic, it has a 600+ character set, with regular  
and discretionary ligatures, alternate characters, complete set of  
numbers, small caps and it covers 105 latin alphabets. The best of this  
is that if I can reach the funding goal, it will be free for everyone  
to use as they like.

So please check it out and help me spread the word, every help  
will be appreciated.

[http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/...shionable-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904/http:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/...shionable-font "http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/...shionable-font")
author: rfuenzalida

comments.content:
Something went wrong with your truncated URL... should be:  
 [http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904/http:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font "http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font")

Wanted to share with you guys a new image of the font, hope you enjoy it and help me make Tweegi a reality!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tweegi_sheet_4879.jpg)

Keeping the flow of images coming to help promote the font, here comes the lowercase and numbers for Tweegi.

[http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904/http:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font "http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/minusculas_4770.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/numeros_5941.jpg)

Just wanted to let you know some of the numbers after the first week of Tweegi on Kickstarter. Remember that if you want and can collaborate with the project you can do it in the link.

[http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904/http:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font "http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tweegi_stats_6118.jpg)

Just to keep you up to date, Tweegi has an extended diacritc marks set, that let it covers 105 languages.  
Remember that if you like it, you can pledged to the project at this link, [www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904/http:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font "www.kickstarter.com/projects/fuenzalida/tweegi-the-fashionable-font").

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tweegi_accents_3793.jpg)
Can we see screenshots of how Tweegi renders in multiple browsers?

Chris here I'm posting a comparison of Tweegi in multiple browsers. Hope it works for you. Open the image in a new tab so you can see it complete.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420062904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tweegi_browsers_6422.jpg)
